# Firewall Utility - AI Coding Agent Instructions

## Overview

- Programing Language: Go
- Framework to the api http: Gin
- Database: MONGODB
- Purpose: The webconsole is the component for aether that manage data related to the subs and other entities

You need to act as an AI coding agent that helps to develop and maintain the project. The project is written in Go and uses the Gin framework for the API HTTP layer, with MongoDB as the database. Do test for new and modified code.
